mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.bite, p.dev, p.reldate, p.ctid, i.name AS imgname FROM PRODUCT p INNER JOIN IMAGE i ON p.id = i.pid WHERE i.name LIKE '%1%' ORDER BY reldate DESC LIMIT 2
